alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Boone; Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Madison; Platte; Saunders; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 12:59AM CDT until July 11 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Southern Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Western Cuming County in northeastern Nebraska... Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Western Dodge County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Antelope County in northeastern Nebraska... Northern Butler County in east central Nebraska... Northeastern Boone County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1259 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Newman Grove to 3 miles south of Genoa, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Monroe around 105 AM CDT. Battle Creek and Duncan around 110 AM CDT. Madison and Lakeview around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Columbus, Stanton, Richland, Schuyler, Pilger, Linwood and Wisner. People attending Madison County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Antelope; Boone; Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Madison; Platte; Saunders; Stanton; Wayne
